Mbangalala nahase kwivwa chivumo chakutezuka chikuma kuhambakana kala chuma chakutenga chahano hamavu. Oloze matwitwi enyi apwa amandende nge mutwe wafwenete, kaha nawa vawatenga mujila yayashi.
Shinganyekenu hachuma chino: Mumatwitwi ambangalala mwatwama ndaji. Ndaji hindaji yeji kundendesanga maselusi awana halwola lumwe.
Hamyaka yayivulu, vatu vanalinangulanga vyuma vize vyeji kukafwanga mbangalala evwenga chivumo. Vaka-sayasi vahaYunivesiti yaStrathclyde mulifuchi lyaScotland vesekele kuzachisa vivumo vyakulisezaseza mangana vamone nge mbangalala mwevwako. Vesekele kundenda chandaji yenyi mangana vawane omu eji kwivwanga, kaha jize “jindaji” jevwile chivumo chakutezuka chakuheta ku 300 (300 kilohertz), kaha kafukufuku eji kwivwanga chivumo chakutezuka chakuheta ku 212 (212 kilohertz). Ishi wamunene wamukalungalwiji eji kwivwanga chivumo chakuheta ku 160, kaha vatu veji kuhonanga kwivwa chivumo chakuheta ku 20 (kilohertz).
Vaka-kuhehwojola vamwe vasaka kuzachisa ngolo jambangalala jakwivwa chivumo mangana vatunge makina amahya. Mujila muka? Ndotolo James Windmil wahaYunivesiti yaStrathclyde ambile ngwenyi, “Hakusaka tutunge jimayikolofwoni jamwaza kaha nawa jajindende, tunahase kuhaka eji jimayikolofwoni mumakina akufwana nge jishinga jakutambuka najo navyuma vyeka vize vyeji kutukafwanga twivwenga kanawa chivumo.
Munashinganyeka Ngachilihi? Uno kwivwa chambangalala chivumo mujila yakukomwesa chalijilile chivene tahi nyi valingile chakutenga?

Ha 20 ya Julho ndo 20 ya Agosto 2023, atu kuhiana tununu 2 a tununu kayile ni kutala konda ya mapwo ya yifuchi yeswe ya FIFA yize yinakapalika mu mambonge anji a mu Austrália ni Nova Zelândia. Ha mashimbu a yiheho yacho, mandumbu 1,200 a malunga ni a mapwo yalihana hanga ambujole mu mambonge livwa a yifuchi yino yaali. Atu 18 yeta malongeso a Mbimbiliya.
Mu Sydney, Austrália, akweze a mapwo aali a ku Índia yakundama ku temba lia kwambujola nalio, mba yamona ngwo ha temba hapwile ha kusoneka ngwo
... 
o wacho yamba ngwenyi kali wa ku Papua Nova Guiné. Iye kakomokene ha kunyingika ngwenyi, alunga ni pwo wano no katwamine ku Papua Nova Guiné ha amwe mashimbu. Chino yichaatwala kupwa ni umwe lusango mupema, yaliaha numero ja telefone. Mandumbu wano yalitesa hanga amutwale anyingike kanawa mbonge, chocho yazachisa uhashi wacho hanga amwambulwile umwenemwene wa mu Mbimbiliya. Mwana-pwo wacho muze afunyine ku chifucho cho yatayiza longeso lia Mbimbiliya.
Mu Auckland, Nova Zelândia, ndumbu wa pwo av
...
kumukolweza hanga aye ku kukunguluka. Mandumbu waze te anakalakala ni temba yakwasa hanga Nicholas apwe kumeneka kuli umwe Chela cha Yehova yoze wakuhanjika limi lia espanhol. Chikwo nawa, ha poso yize yene yalilulieka hanga amukwase kuya ha kukunguluka cha Mambonge chakwamba ngwo, “Lihumikizenu”!
Tunasakwiila chinji hali mandumbu ni mapangi jetu a mu Austrália ni Nova Zelândia ha tachi jize asele hanga ‘apanguke ngwe lutemo’ ha kwambujola sango ja Wanangana ha chiwanyino chacho.—A-Fwilipu 2:15.

“Maswalale vamuMbavilone vanalitwamina kwasa jita”
“Mbavilone nayikasala milumba yamalolwa [nakupwa] ngundu haya myaka yosena”
Kufuma vene mu 539 B.C.E., Mbavilone kayapwile cheka nangolo jakuyulako. Alekesande Wamunene afwililile kulingisa Mbavilone kupwa nganda yenyi oloze afwile. Mumakumbi avaka-Kulishitu, vaYuleya vachipwile lika nakutwama muMbavilone, kaha echi chalingishile kaposetolo Petulu avatambukile. Oloze mulikulukaji lyamyaka lyamuchiwana C.E., Mbavilone vayinongesele kaha yasalile ngundu

Mikanda Yetu Kuchi Akuyisoneka ni Kuyilumbununa?
Mba twambujole kanwa “sango jipema” ku “mavungu eswe, ni ku minyachi yeswe, ni ku malimi eswe, ni kuli atu eswe,” twakulinga mikanda mu unji wa 600 a malimi. (Usolwelo 14:6) Kuchi twakuhasa kulinga mulimo uno ukalu? Twakuulinga ni ukwaso wa chizavu cha akwa kusoneka, ni amwe akwa kulumbununa maliji, kali mu unji wa 3,000—eswe kali Yela ja Yehova a mu yifuchi yeswe.
Mukanda utangu kakuululieka mu limi lia inglês. Chizavu cha Tusongwelo, 
... 
dako jeka ni jeka, nawa mikanda yetu yakutoweza atu a ku mavungu eswe.
Mukanda wacho kakuutuma kuli akwa kulumbununa. Muze hausoneka nyi mautayiza, kakuutuma kuli yizavu ya akwa kulumbununa mu yifuchi yeswe, waze akulumbununa, ayo kakuuhengula, ni kuutanga. Ayo kakusa tachi hanga asakule “maliji aumwenemwene,” kakupwa ni ushindakenyo weswe wa maliji aze ali mu Inglês, mba ahase kwalumbununa mu limi lio.—Chilumbununyi 12:10.

HILYACHIWANA jino naufuku, omu hanahichi lyehi makumbi avali. Yesu navaposetolo jenyi 12 vaneza muzuvo yino yahelu nakulya Paseka. Uze lunga anakulovoka ikiye Yuta Isakalyote. Anakuya nakulweza vapilishitu mwakumukwachila Yesu.
Zau, Yuta ayanga kuli vakivo nakuvehula ngwenyi: ‘Namunguhana ika nge nangumikafwa kumukwata Yesu?’ Vakivo ngwavo: ‘Jimbongo japalata makumi atatu.’ Shikaho Yuta anakuya akawane vaze malunga mangana avatwale kuli Yesu. Uno ou keshi ukenyako nyi?
Kulya chaPaseka chinakumu.

1. Uno Mwenya-Mbimbiliya Iya?
Mujimbu wamwaza wakwamba ngwavo vatu navakayoya haya myaka yosena hano hamavu vausoneka muMbimbiliya. (Samu 37:29) MuMbimbiliya mwatwama mikanda yayindende 66. Kalunga azachishile malunga vakushishika kafwe 40 vasoneke mikanda kana. Mikanda yakuputukilako yitanu vayisonekele kuli Mose kafwe myaka 3,500 yinahichi kunyima. Mukanda wamakumishilo vausonekele kuli kaposetolo Yowano kafwe myaka 1,900 yinahichi kunyima. Uno vishinganyeka vyeya vasonekele vaze malunga muMbi
... 
avavulu chikuma mumalimi kafwe makulukaji. Numba tuhu wapwa himukanda wakumwaka, oloze vyuma wahanjika vyalitombola navyuma vawana vaka-sayasi. Kaha nawa vaze malunga 40 vasonekele Mbimbiliya kavalimbalaka umwe namukwavoko. Vyuma yahanjika Mbimbiliya hazangi vyafuma kuli Kalunga wamuchano wazangi. Mbimbiliya yikwechi nawa ngolo jakwalumuna kuyoya chavatu chipwenga chamwaza. Evi vikiko vyakunyula vatu vavavulu vamone Mbimbiliya kupwa Mazu aKalunga.—Tangenu Wavaka-Tesolonyika 1, 2:13.
3. Uno Mbimb
...
fwa mwivwishise Mbimbiliya kuzachisa jila yize azachishile Yesu. Yesu enyikililenga kuMbimbiliya nakukafwa vatu “vamone kanawa mwalumbunukilile Visoneka.”—Tangenu Luka 24:27, 45.
Kakweshi vyuma vyeka vinahase kumisuulwisa ngana mwamujimbu wamwaza wakufuma kuli Kalungako. Oloze vatu vamwe vatwama nakanengauli kumujimbu kana, kaha veka veji kupihililanga hakuwivwa. Kamwatela kulizuzukila nawomako. Lutalililo lwenu lwakuyoya haya myaka yosena lwapendamina hakutachikiza Kalunga.—Tangenu Yowano 17:3.

LOTE natanga yenyi vatwaminenga naApalahama muKanane. Likumbi limwe Apalahama ambile kuli Lote ngwenyi: ‘Katweshi nachihela chakulishila vimuna vetu vosenako. Kumana tulihandunune. Nge ove muya kumutamba woku, kaha ami nanguya kumutamba ukwavo.’
Lote andwile meso enyi nakushishika lifuchi. Amwene mutamba walifuchi wamwaza wapwile nameya namwila wauvulu wakulisa vimuna. Eli Lifuchi lyakuYotau. Oku kukiko Lote atwalile tanga navimuna jenyi. Kaha vatungile limbo munganda yaSotome.

Natulinangulaho chuma chimwe hano. Chinakusolola nge Kalunga eji kuyovola vaze vamwononoka, oloze vaze kavamwononokako navakafwa.

Sakula chihela chalita. Nyi muchilita, fupa chihela chipema chize chinatemuka kanawa. Muhasa kutwama ku mesa, hanji kufupa chimwe chihela chipema haze lia zuwo.
-
Yako ku chihela kuze mupwa ukawe. Yesu kasakwile kulemba “ha chimenemene” ku chihela “kwaukawenyi.” (Marku 1:35) Nyi kuwahashile kupwa ukawe, lweza asoko je hanji waze watwama no ku zuwo, anyingike mashimbu waze mulilongesa ni kwaeta hanga ahone kukupinjisa ha mashimbu jacho.
-
Lihulikile ha yize unalilongesa. Ehuka yuma yize muyikupinjisa. Nyi mulilongesa kupalikila mu telefone hanji tablet, tepulula zungo hanji kuyisa ha kachilayi ka ndeke (modo de voo) hanga yihone kukupinjisa. Muze unalilongesa, nyi mwiuluka chimwe chuma chize watamba kulinga, chisoneke hanga uchilinge muze muuhwisa kulilongesa. Nyi mumona ngwo kuwahashile kulihulikila ha malongeso, mana ndambu hanga wolole molu.

Vatu vaze vapwile Vinjiho jaYehova vakumbapachisa oloze valitwamina kwambulula mujimbu pamo mwomwo yakuzeya, katweshi kulitwamina kulikata navoko. Lwola lumwe tweji kuyanga nakuvakolezeza nakuvakafwa mangana vazame cheka kushipilitu.
Katweshi kufumisa mutu muchikungulwilo chikalu kaha nge navulumuna mulonga washili wauneneko, nduma. Oloze nge Chinjiho wakumbapachisa mwapwa natato yakuhokola jishimbi jamuMbimbiliya nakuhona kupihilila nakwalumuka, kaha tweji kumufumisa muchikungulwilo nakuhona kulikata nenyi. Mbimbiliya yahanjika hatoma ngwayo: “Mufumisenu uze muka-kuhuka muli enu.”—Wavaka-Kolinde 1, 5:13.
Nyi ngachilihi nge lunga vanamufumisa muchikungulwilo, oloze puwenyi navana venyi hanga vachili lika Vinjiho jaYehova? Keshi kulikata nachikungulwiloko, oloze eji kutwalaho lika kulinunga natanga yenyi. Ulo wavo weji kutwalililaho lika nakulizanga lika natanga yenyi.
Mutu vafumisa muchikungulwilo nahase kutwalaho lika kwiza kukukunguluka chetu. Kaha nawa lwola lumwe vakulwane muchikungulwilo vanahase kumukafwa kushipilitu. Veji kulinga vyuma kanevi mangana vakafwe vaze vatu vatengamo cheka kupwa Vinjiho jaYehova. Vatu vahanga muchikungulwilo vaze veji kumbilanga vilinga vyavo vyavipi nakufwila kukavangiza jishimbi jamuMbimbiliya veji kuvatambulanga cheka muchikungulwilo.

Yena Mukalinga Upale wa Yehova?
Tunasakwila chinji ha mashimbu waze yena wachiza hanga uhengwole kamukanda kano, hanga unyingike Yela ja Yehova chize apwa, ni kunyingika nawa milimo yetu, ni kumona chize ululikiso wetu unende. Yetwe tunafuliela ngwo kamukanda kano kakukwasa chinji ha kutunyingika ngwo tuli atu waze analinga upale wa Yehova musono. Yetwe tunakukolweza hanga ununge ni kulilongesa yinyingi ya Zambi, mba uyilumbunune kuli asoko je, ni kuli masepa je, nawa lichinge ni yetwe ha mashimbu eswe mu yikungululo yetu ya Akwa Kristu.—A-Hepreu 10:23-25.
Yena mukanyingika chinji nyi walilongesa hakutwala kuli Yehova, nawa muhasa kumona chize iye ali ni zango lia umwenemwene hali yena. Yena mukapwa ni tachi ja kulinga yeswayo muhasa hanga usolole zango lie hali iye. (1 Yoano 4:8-10, 19) Mba kuchi yena muhasa kusolola zango liacho matangwa eswe ku mwono we? Mumu liaka kwononokena ku shimbi ja Yehova chili chipema ku mwono we? Nawa yika muyikukwasa hanga uzange kulinga upale wa Zambi hamuwika ni yetwe? Longeshi we wa Mbimbiliya mawahilila chinji hanga alumbunune yihula yacho hamuwika ni yena mba yena ni asoko je nuhase ‘kulifunga mu zango lia Zambi, . . . ndoo ku mwono wa mutolo.’—Yundase 21.
Nyi chiseke chinji tunechi kuli yena hanga ununge ni kusenya kulutwe mu jila ya umwenemwene ha kulilongesa mikanda yikwo . . . ‘Mantenha-se no Amor de Deus’

Uno munahase kukumbulula ngachilihi chihula chinakavangizaho?
UNO KUYOYA CHAPUTUKILE NGACHILIHI? ․․․․․.
A. CHALIJILILE CHIVENE
B. VALINGILE CHAKUTENGA
VATU VAMWE vanahase kwamba ngwavo mutu uze alinangula chikuma vyasayasi nahase kwamba ngwenyi “chalijilile chivene,” kaha mutu uze afwelela muli Kalunga nahase kwamba ngwenyi “valingile chakutenga.”
Oloze keshi nge vosena veji kukumbululanga mwomumweko.
Mutu alinangula chikuma vyasayasi Rama Singh, uze eji kutangishilanga haMcMaster University mulifuchi lyaCanada ambile ngwenyi: “Keshi nge vatu vaze vafwelela muli Kalunga kaha vakiko vahunga kunangula chavyuma vyakulijila viveneko, oloze navatu vavavulu vaze vatanga chikuma vahunga kunangula kana.”
Achishinganyekenu Gerard uze alinangwile chikuma vyakuyoya chatututu uze vanangwile vyuma vyakulijila vivene kushikola yakukaye. Ambile ngwenyi: “Omu ngwasonekelenga vyeseko, ngwakumbulwilenga vihula kana nakuvihana kuli valongeshi. Oloze kangwafwelelele vyuma kanako.”
Mwomwo ika navatu vaze valinangula chikuma vyasayasi vachiwana kupwa chachikalu kwitavila nge kuyoya chalijilile chivene? Hakusaka tukumbulule chihula kana, tuchitalenu havihula vivali vize veji kuhonanga kwivwishisa vaka-kuhehwojola vavavulu: (1) Uno kuyoya chaputukile ngachilihi? (2) Uno vyuma vyakuyoya vyaputukile ngachilihi?

KUCHI MUTUHASA KUZANGA YEHOVA NI KUZEYELA LIJI LIENYI?
LILONGESE MBIMBILIYA: Mba uzange Yehova, chitangu watamba kulilongesa hakutwala kuli iye kupalikila mu Mbimbiliya. Nyi walilongesa chinji Mbimbiliya mumona ngwo Yehova kali Zambi wa zango, chikwo nawa kanazange yuma yipema hali yena. Iye ‘kakukufunga’ kashika kanazange hanga ulembe kuli iye. (1 Petulu 5:7) Mbimbiliya yinalakenya ngwo, nyi wasa tachi hanga ukundame kuli Zambi ni “iye kumakakundama kuli” yena.—Tiangu 4:8.
KAULA KU MWONO WE YUMA YIZE UNALILONGESA: Musolola ngwo unapanjika Zambi ha kukaula yiyulo yenyi ya mana yize yili mu Mbimbiliya. Nyi walinga chino “muwahisa jila ye; chocho yuma ye muyiwaha.”—Yoshua 1:8.

Mbimbiliya kayisonekene ni ukwaso wa spiritu yisandu ya Zambi, mu limi lia Hepreu, Arame, ni Ngregu. Mbimbiliya katamba kuyilumbununa mu malimi anji mba atu a “ku mavungu eswe” ahase kuyuka nayo. Ha 29 Outubro, 2023, Mbimbiliya—Katuhwishile Mukanda wa Mateu mu Limi lia Chopi ha chimwe kukunguluka chalipwila mu Quissico, Moçambique. Ndumbu Marcelo Santos, wa mu Komite ya Mutango mu Moçambique, yafambwisa mukanda wa Mateu mu limi lia Chopi ha chimwe kukunguluka haze hapwile atu 460. Eswe waze apwileho katambwile mukanda wacho ha mafwo. Kausele nawa mu site ni mu maliji a kukopa hanga atu ahase ku uchiza.
Chinasoloka ngwe atu tununu 1.1 a tununu kakuhanjika limi lia Chopi. Atu jacho mu Moçambique, kanaswila chinji mu mambonge a ku sule. Kuli mandumbu kuhiana 332 waze ali mu yikungulwila shimbiali ya limi lia Chopi ni yizavu yitano. Chipwe ngwe kuli Mbimbiliya jikwo mu limi lia Chopi, nihindu mu Mbimbiliya jacho kumushi jina lia Yehova. Kuchizako yino, jakufwika ndando yinji, nawa kanji-kanji maliji waze akuzachisamo kali akalu kwatanga.
Tunawahilila hamwe ni mandumbu jetu akuhanjika limi lia Chopi ha kutambula mukanda uno afwambwisa, tunalembe hanga ukwase atu anji waze anafupu meya akekema a umwenemwene wa mu Liji lia Zambi.—Izaia 55:1.

Kufumaho lihanenu mapapilo munasoneka mangana mutu himutu azachile hajijila jize nasoneka muka-mahyenyi. Fwilenu kuzachila havyuma nasoneka muka-mahyenu mangana musolole kavumbi. Nge hakachi kenu nahapwa umwe mwaputuka kusolola kavumbi, kaha mukwavo mwalinga mwomumwe.

Kumbululo lia mu Mbimbiliya
Spiritu yisandu yili tachi ja Zambi. (Mika 3:8; Luka 1:35) Mbimbiliya yakwamba ngwo, ‘kakutuma spiritu yenyi’ ku chihela cheswacho mazanga hanga amanunune upale wenyi.—Samu 104:30; 139:7.
Mu Mbimbiliya liji “spiritu” linakatuka mu limi lia Hepreu ruʹach ni mu limi lia Ngregu pneuʹma. Kanji-kanji, liji liacho liakulumbunuka tachi ja Zambi, hanji spiritu yisandu. (Uputukilo 1:2) Alioze mu Mbimbiliya, liji liliene mulihasa kupwa ni ulumbunwiso ukwo, ngwe:
Mwiku.—Habakuke

upalikila mu umwe usolwelo, iye kamwenemo wika atu aali hi atatu ko. ...

Kumbululo Lia Mbimbiliya
Mbimbiliya yakutongola chato hanji kulisoneka ha mujimba chisuho chimuwika ha mukanda wa Ulevi 19:28 unambe ngwo, “Kanda nukachata mijimba yenu.” Zambi kahanyine shimbi yino kuli A-Izalele hanga alise ni atu akwo waze te akulichata hanji kulisoneka majina ni yilayi ya tuzambi two ha mijimba yo. (Shimbi Yamuchiali 14:2) Chipwe ngwe shimbi yize Yehova ahanyine kuli A-Izalele kuyatalile hali Akwa-Kristu musono, nihindu tulieswe twatamba kuhengwola kanawa yize shimbi yacho y
... 
ulisolola hanji kupwa ni utuswilo, Akwo kakulichata hanji kulisoneka ha mujimba mumu kakunyonga ngwo mujimba hi wo, kashika ayo akulinga yeswawo anazange. Alioze Mbimbiliya yakukolweza Akwa-Kristu ngwo: “Nutumbikile mijimba yenu mulambu wa mwono, usandu, wa kupemena chikolo kuli Zambi. Chenacho we uvumbiko wenu wakulita ni kunyonga cha mana.” (A-Roma 12:1) Zachisa “kunyonga cha mana” hanga uhengwole mumu liaka unazange kulichata hanji kulisoneka ha mujimba. Nyi ngwe unazange kuchilinga hanga wim
...

Chikwo nawa kujimuna chato hanji sona jize mutu mafunjika ha mujimba, chakumbata mbongo jinji ni kuneha yikola. Akwa-kuhengwola hamwe ni akwa-mingoso ya kujimuna chato, kakusolola ngwo atu anji waze alisele chato ha mijimba yo, kakwamba ngwo kachi te kakakwachile chiyulo chacho.

Kutala nakukeza kapwa fulumende yimwe mukaye kosena tahi?
Achishinganyekenu omu fulumende yakuyula kaye kosena yinahase kunganyalisa vatu. Vatu vavavulu makumbi ano vali nakuyanda mwomwo yauhutu, oloze veka vali naluheto chikuma. Oloze fulumende yamwaza yakeke yinahase kuhana vatu vyuma vyosena vasaka. Munashinganyeka ngwenu vatu navakahasa kutunga fulumende yangana nyi?—Tangenu Yelemiya 10:23.
Putu vene kushikulu, jifulumende jinahononga kuzakama kanawa vatu javo chikumanyi vaka-kuhutwa. Jifulumende jimwe japwa jaukenya. (Muka-kwambulula 4:1; 8:9) Oloze Kalunga Wangolo Josena ashika ngwenyi mwakaneha fulumende yize nayikashisa jifulumende josena eji jiliko. Muka-kuyula fulumende kaneyi mwakazakama vatu chikuma.—Tangenu Isaya 11:4; Ndanyele 2:44.
Vyuma muka naukalinga Wangana waKalunga?
Yehova Kalunga nasakula Muka-kuyula wamwenemwene, Mwanenyi Yesu. (Luka 1:31-33) Omu apwile hano hamavu, Yesu asakilenga kukafwa vatu. Hakupwa Mwangana, mwakanunga vatu vakumafuchi osena nakufumisako kuyanda chosena.—Tangenu Samu 72:8, 12-14.
Uno vatu vosena vetavila Yesu kupwa Muka-kuyula tahi? Nduma. Oloze Yehova ali nakuvatalilila chikoki. (WaPetulu 2, 3:9) Nahane vatu lwola lwakwitavila Yesu kupwa Muka-kuyula. Kalinwomu ngana, Yesu mwafumisako vatu vavapi vosena hano hamavu nakuneha kuunda namukingo mukaye kosena.—Tangenu Mika 4:3, 4.

Mwomwo ika twatela kwanuka kufwa chaYesu?
Kufwa chaYesu chapwa chachilemu chikuma mukuyoya chavatu, mwomwo chalingisa vatu vakayoye kanawa ngana muze chapwile hakavanga. Mutu kavamutengele namuchima wakufwila kulinganga vyuma vyavipi, nakuviza nakufwako. (Kuputuka 1:31) Oloze shili yengilile mukaye kuhichila muli mutu umwe, Alama. Ngocho, Yesu atufwililile mangana atusokole kushili nakukufwa.—Tangenu Mateu 20:28; Wavaka-Loma 6:23.
Kalunga asolwele zangi yakulipwila hakututumina mwanenyi hano hamavu mangana atufwile. (WaYowano 1, 4:9, 10) Yesu alwezele vaka-kumukavangiza vanukenga kufwa chenyi kuzachisa mbolo navinyo. Kaha kulinga chilika kana mwaka himwaka nachisolola nge twasakwilila Kalunga naYesu hazangi vatusolwelele.—Tangenu Luka 22:19, 20.
IYA ATELA KULYA MBOLO NAKUNWA VINYO HACHILIKA KANA?
Halwola lwakulivanga luze Yesu alwezele tumbaji twenyi vanukenga kufwa chenyi, ahanjikile vyalushiko chipwe ngwetu chivwasano. (Mateu 26:26-28) Elu lushiko lwalingishile tumbaji twenyi navatu veka vavandende vakapwe vamyangana navapilishitu hamwe naikiye mwilu. Numba tuhu vatu vavavulu veji kwanukanga kufwa chaYesu, oloze vaze ashika lushiko kana vakiko kaha vatela kulya mbolo nakunwa vinyo kana.—Tangenu Kusoloka 5:10.
Hamyaka kafwe 2,000 yinahichimo, Yehova nasakulanga vaze navakapwa vamyangana. (Luka 12:32) Vatu kana vapwa vavandende hakuvesekesa kuli vaze navakayoyela hano hamavu haya myaka yosena.—Tangenu Kusoloka 7:4, 9, 17.
